[Notes]
[for adding more cheats for ability, add and change the last line, replace xx with the values below]
[610f0000 00000000 000000xx]

[Regular Ability Type: 
01 sword 
02 cutter 
03 leaf 
04 whip 
05 fire 
06 needle 
07 beam 
08 spark 
09 stone 
0a sleep 
0b parasol 
0c water 
0d hi jump 
0e tornado 
0f bomb 
10 spear 
11 hammer
12 ice  
13 wing 
14 ninja 
15 fighter
16 sand 
17 mecha 
18 crash 
19 mike 
1a festival 
1b landia not recommended]

[Ultra Ability Type: 
1c ultra sword 
1d monster flame 
1e flare beam 
1f grand hammer 
20 snow bowl]
